text: @realDonaldTrump Which was preceded by the biggest stock market #loss in history too.  Nearly 1/3 of its total value even. You can spin it any way you want, but you still suck at this job. We are better off without you. #ResignNowtrump, the #coronavirus has you beat. https://t.co/apx54CNHYx

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
